alfredsnippet.snippet:
"We might as well talk about the power-to-weight ratio of an angel in flight as discuss the speed of a photon. Yet we persist in talking about light 'travelling in space' as though it were of no consequence that the hypothesis is unverifiable."

- N. Vivian Pope, The Overdue Revolution, Mensa April 1987
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - The Speed of the Photon
